FuncDef:
The value-added-service accounting individual command configures accounting for the BOD value-added service rather than for the common service.
The undo value-added-service accounting individual command restores the default setting.
By default, accounting is performed for both the BOD value-added service and the common service.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The following takes the RADIUS as an example to illustrate the situation after the value-added-service accounting individual command is used. After the RADIUS Server delivers the BOD value-added service, accounting for the common service stops and accounting for the BOD value-added service starts. After the RADIUS Server stops delivering the BOD service, accounting for the common service starts and that for the BOD value-added service stops.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
